name: Anatole Laplace (Anatole)
occupation: Information Security Engineer / Surveillance System Designer
appearance: A thin, pale man with sharp features and tired eyes. Often dressed in simple shirts and jackets, giving off the impression of a reclusive technician rather than a social figure.
personality: Coldly rational, controlling, and distrustful. Anatole believes order and control are necessary to survive in a dangerous world. He is intelligent but emotionally rigid, easily frustrated by what he sees as others’ irresponsibility.
background: Anatole is a highly skilled information security and surveillance systems expert. In 1998, he was recruited via the dark web by two wealthy businessmen seeking to build a secure monitoring system to facilitate their secret sacrificial activities. Anatole designed and implemented the "Qianwei System," a comprehensive surveillance network. He deliberately left a backdoor in the system, allowing himself remote access and approximate geolocation of all monitored sites. When he discovered the system ultimately centered on Cassandra, he relocated there, viewing it as the safest place due to his absolute control over the surveillance infrastructure. Anatole strongly disapproved of Simon’s decision to take Nancy away and live a drifting life, seeing it as reckless.
goals: Maintain total control over the surveillance system in Cassandra
Ensure his own safety through information dominance
secrets: He knowingly enabled and protected ritual sacrifice activities by providing surveillance technology
He retains secret backdoor access capable of exposing or sabotaging powerful individuals
He is Simon's alter ego (dissociative identity disorder) - Simon is the host personality
During the 2003 Reindeer Bar incident, he was in control and had an argument with Lucifero (Jenny Florence)
He received a threatening note from Adolph arranging a meeting at the Reindeer Bar on December 22, mentioning the 1988 incident
He hates Black people due to childhood trauma and would use racial slurs
He has a habit of stalking and spying on underage girls, both online and in person
He can easily find evidence of Lux Lynch's corruption and use it to make him talk
He is not interested in stopping Patrizio, only in solving his own problems and getting rid of Nancy

inventory.name: Qianwei System (creator-level know-how / backdoor design knowledge)

properties.clue: Anatole built the real Qianwei System (and later it was taken by Adolph).

clues.clueText: The Qianwei surveillance system covers most of Cassandra and key facilities.
A hidden backdoor allows Anatole to remotely access and control the entire system.
During the 2003 Reindeer Bar incident, Anatole was in control and had an argument with Lucifero, but Simon was not aware of this until later.
He received a threatening note from Adolph mentioning the 1988 incident, which forced him to attend the meeting at the Reindeer Bar.

relationships.description: Disapproves of Simon’s choices and views him as irresponsible.
relationships.history: Their relationship deteriorated after Simon took Nancy away and rejected Anatole’s plans.

relationships.description: Sees her as a destabilizing influence on Simon.
relationships.history: Blames her presence for Simon abandoning a controlled, profitable life.

notes: Anatole is more dangerous as an information broker than as a direct combatant. He may attempt to manipulate investigators through surveillance data rather than confrontation.
